amendment.description: To create clean energy jobs through predictable and fair incentives for renewable energy.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 715 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 715 proposed by Senator Coons for Senator Bennet. (consideration: CR S1883; text: CR S1883) To create clean energy jobs through predictable and fair incentives for renewable energy.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 715 proposed by Senator Coons for Senator Bennet.
